title: Nativity
description: Nativity: Virgin and Saint Joseph in browns and blues; lightened with gold.  Angels: left, blue dress, green wings; right, tan robe, blue wings.  Architectural details, yellow, sky blue, mountain and tree green.  Sheep white; shepherds tan, blue, brown; ground green.
creditline: Bequest of John R. Van Derlip in memory of Ethel Morrison Van Derlip
